name: lineName
title: Line Name
description: expected line ID (e.g. CO1-0).  Do we adopt the ALMA convention for names? should be created by the observing script

name: projectTitle
title: Project Title
description: The title of the project as submitted by the PI

name: obsDate
title: Date
description: Date of observation (FITS standard) at start of integration

name: velType
title: Velocity Type
description: Velocity type of FITS cube axiis3, either frequency or velocity

name: contSens
title: Cont. Sensitivity (Jy/beam)
description: continuum sensitivity (Jy/beam). Not needed for SLR

name: lineSens
title: SL Sensitivity (K)
description: spectral line sensitivity in 10 km/s window (K of Ta*). Not needed for TOLTEC

name: qaGrade
title: QA Grade
description: quality assessment grade [if QA fails do data still go into dataverse?]

name: boundingBox
title: Bounding Box
description: for mosaics, outside bounding box, list of vertices, e.g. Python list of tuples
